mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPAS_BIZ_LOCATION_DATA ( LOCATION_BIZ_ADDR1, LOCATION_BIZ_ADDR2, LOCATION_BIZ_ADDR3, LOCATION_BIZ_ADDR4, LOCATION_BIZ_ADDR5, LOCATION_HOME_ADDR1, LOCATION_HOME_ADDR2, LOCATION_HOME_ADDR3, LOCATION_HOME_ADDR4, LOCATION_HOME_ADDR5, LOCATION_PER_ADDR1, LOCATION_PER_ADDR2, LOCATION_PER_ADDR3, LOCATION_PER_ADDR4, LOCATION_PER_ADDR5, LOCATION_APPLY_ADDR1, LOCATION_APPLY_ADDR2, LOCATION_APPLY_ADDR3, LOCATION_APPLY_ADDR4, LOCATION_APPLY_ADDR5, LOCATION_OTH_ADDR1, LOCATION_OTH_ADDR2, LOCATION_OTH_ADDR3, LOCATION_OTH_ADDR4, LOCATION_OTH_ADDR5, APP_ID, IDENTITYCARD, CELL, NAME,SWIFT_NUMBER, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER ) VALUES ( #{locationBizAddr1, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationBizAddr2, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationBizAddr3, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationBizAddr4, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationBizAddr5, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationHomeAddr1, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationHomeAddr2, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationHomeAddr3, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationHomeAddr4, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationHomeAddr5, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationPerAddr1, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationPerAddr2, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationPerAddr3, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationPerAddr4, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationPerAddr5, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationApplyAddr1, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationApplyAddr2, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationApplyAddr3, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationApplyAddr4, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationApplyAddr5, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationOthAddr1, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationOthAddr2, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationOthAddr3, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationOthAddr4, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{locationOthAddr5, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{appId, jdbcType = CHAR}, #{identityCard, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{cell, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{swiftNumber, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, 'SYSTEM' )
